name: Eastwood Forest Tapes
description:
The investigators found a VHS Tape inside the Eastwood Forest. You got the job to watch this tape and find out what happened to the person in the tape.

The person in the tape suddenly wakes up in the middle of Eastwood Forest. He has no memory how did he got there.

He only knows one thing. He need to get to his car faster than the sounds to him.

There are multiple endings to this game.

Approximate playtime: 10~ minutes or less.

CONTROLS

WASD                    Movement                  E Interact Shift Run
